bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like to visit flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🐝 I start with the letter 'B'.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and people say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My name has 'lady' in it.
🔴 I am often red or orange.
⚫ I have spots on my back.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I'm green and can jump really high! What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🟢 I am the color of plants.
🦗 My name is similar to 'hopper'.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 You might see me at a picnic.
🏠 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I crawl on leaves and eat them, then make a cozy bed before becoming something new. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I turn into something beautiful.
🥬 I like to munch on leaves.
🦋 I make a chrysalis/cocoon.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My web is like a trap.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 I live in my web.

bug.question: I light up the night with my bright, flashing light. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
🌙 I am often seen at night.
🔥 My name includes fire.

bug.question: I suck blood and make you itch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be annoying in the summer.
🩹 I leave a small bump after I bite.
💧 I need blood to live.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. People think I'm creepy! What am I?

hints.text: 💯 My name has 'cent' in it, which means hundred.
👣 I have lots of pairs of legs.
🌿 I like dark, damp places.

bug.question: I make silk for you to wear, but I start as a worm that loves mulberry leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🧣 My silk is used to make clothes.
🍃 I only eat one kind of leaf.
🧵 I start with the letter 'S'.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella to stay dry. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from the clouds.
☔ I make puddles.
🌧️ Plants like me.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 I help flowers grow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and fall from the sky when it's cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You can make a snowman with me.
❄️ I am cold and powdery.
🌨️ I melt when it gets warm.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I am air moving.

weather.question: I am a white, puffy shape in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like animals.
☁️ I float in the sky.
🌧️ Sometimes I am dark and full of water.

weather.question: I'm a frozen raindrop that falls from the sky. Ouch!

hints.text: 🧊 I am very cold and hard.
🤕 They can hurt if they hit you.
🎾 About the size of a ping pong ball sometimes.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
✨ I need the sun and rain to appear.
🍀 People say there is gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am a loud noise and a bright flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come with thunder.
🌩️ I am scary.
⚠️ You should stay inside when I am around.

weather.question: I am very hot and dry. Plants and animals struggle when I'm here for too long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵The desert often has a lot of me.
🔥I'm the opposite of wet.
🌻Farmers worry about their crops when I'm around.

weather.question: I am a big storm with very strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌪️ I can cause a lot of damage.
🏠 People board up their windows when I'm coming.
